channel.title: Help Starting Server
channel.description:
It says cant find path when i click compile and when i click runserver it says java is not recognized as a internal or external command what i do
heres my codes Compile: [code]@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
RunServer [code]@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
i have jdk 6u1

item.title: Help Starting Server
item.dc:creator: @Buddy_0071 Buddy 007
item.description:
@Buddy_0071 wrote:

It says cant find path when i click compile and when i click runserver it says java is not recognized as a internal or external command what i do

heres my codes
Compile:

@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

RunServer

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

i have jdk 6u1

Read full topic
